|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''[[Belkin]]'' P/N: 8830-22345 ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32782-linksys-re6700-ac1200-amplify-dual-band-wi-fi-range-extender-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] (22 July 2015) *CPU: [[MediaTek MT7620A]] @580 MHz WiSoC *Flash: ''Winbond'' W25Q128FV2G 16MB *RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5TU32M16EG-AC 64MB (DDR2) *2.4 GHz Radio: [[MediaTek MT7620A]] 802.11bgn 2x2 WiSoC :''Skyworks'' SKY85303-11 2.4GHz WLAN/Bluetooth FEM (x2) *5 GHz Radio: [[MediaTek]] MT7612EN 2x2 802.11an/ac :''Skyworks'' SKY85717 5GHz 802.11ac Front End Module (x2) *Switch: [[Realtek]] RTL8211E Gigabit Ethernet PHY *Audio: ''Cirrus'' WM8960G Codec w/ Class D Speaker Driver ==See also== [http://www.linksys.com/us/range-extenders/c/wireless-wi-fi-range-extenders/ Wireless Range Extenders]
[[List of Linksys Wireless Devices#Repeaters/Range Extenders|Repeaters/Range Extenders]] *[[Linksys RE6500]] - AC1200 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender *[[Linksys RE6500HG]] - AC1200 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender *Linksys RE6700 - AC1200 AMPLIFY Dual-Band Wi-Fi Range Extender *[[Linksys RE7000]] - AC1900 MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Range Extender [[Category:English Documentation]]
